ns3:EmailContent.ns3:Subject: ACTION REQUIRED - SFDC CRD Changes not sent to Oracle.
ns3:EmailContent.ns3:body:
Hello PSR team:

The following Order CRD Changes could not be sent from SFDC to Oracle. Please wait 20 mins, and then re-trigger this change request in SFDC by doing the following:

1) Search for Order
2) Click on Edit
3) Save the Order WITHOUT making any changes.

Order No Partner PSR Name CRD Change Submitted (GMT)
ORDER_NUMBER216-0PSR_NAME217LastModifiedDate218

Thanks,
CRM Support Team

Please ignore. The following section is for IT Support Team only.

BPEL Instance Id:Instance_ID213
Process Name:Process_Name219

Order No Fault Message Id
ORDER_NUMBER216Fault_Message214

Note: This message was automatically generated, please do not reply to it

Thanks & Regards
Oracle SOA System Admin
